EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Testing On Cloud 9 with TaaS - 2015.04.22.Email - Follow Up - No Shows
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry we missed you at our Testing on Cloud 9 with Tosca as a Service webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: Testing On Cloud 9 with Tosca as a Service (TaaS)
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Sorry we missed you at our recent webinar, Testing on Cloud 9 with Tosca as a Service! In the webinar, Tricentis’ own Michael Niessl gave a live demo showing how Tosca as a Service (TaaS) integrates all the features of Tosca you love with the ease and convenience of the cloud. Questions from the audience helped keep the webinar lively and informative.
If you would like to see what you missed, a recording of our webinar is available here <http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-od-testing-on-cloud-9-with-taas-watch.html>.
If you would like to stay up to date, please follow us on Twitter @Tricentis <https://twitter.com/Tricentis>. For any additional questions, please feel free to follow and tweet our Support Team @TricentisSpprt <https://twitter.com/TricentisSpprt>.
Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
Michael Niessl TaaS Product Owner Tricentis
